items.title: Morning Scan: All the big stories to get you started for the day
items.description: Start your day ahead of the curve with our sharp, curated morning news roundup. Get the key stories from top newspapers and stay informed about the most important developments across various sectors

items.title: Cholamandalam Investment: A promising player in the finance space
items.description: Asset growth and profitability targets remain intact; the stock, however, comes at a rich valuation

items.title: Cello World: Second half likely to be stronger
items.description: The company has immense growth potential on the back of the marketâ€™s shift towards the organised segment and the focus on premium products

items.title: Apple and Google's easy ride is coming to an end
items.description: EU court rulings against Apple and Google mark a new era for of swifter regulation for tech giants

items.title: HDFC Bank in talks with global lenders to offload $1 billion in loans
items.description: Indian banks are under increased regulatory pressure to improve their credit to deposit ratios â€” a measure of how much of a bankâ€™s deposits are being lent out to borrowers. The loan sales will help HDFC improve that ratio, which has worsened in recent years as growth in credit has outpaced deposits

items.title: SC to consider SpiceJet's plea challenging Delhi HC order grounding aircraft engines
items.description: A bench comprising Chief Justice D Y Chandrachud and Justices J B Pardiwala and Manoj Misra asked the counsel for the airline to send an e-mail seeking an urgent hearing of its plea against the high court verdict of September 11

items.title: Zensar â€“ Is it now a serious contender for your long-term portfolio?
items.description: Revenues have started picking up, margins are improving, and order inflows are steady

items.title: YES Bank's stake sale stuck as RBI concerned with majority ownership by foreign bank
items.description: On August 1, Moneycontrol citing sources reported that RBI has asked investors seeking a controlling stake in Yes Bank to reconsider their demands, including acquiring and retaining a majority stake, potentially prolonging the deal process

items.title: How to leverage M&As to expand available capital and opportunities
items.description: Successful deals bring in much-needed capital, foster innovation, creating synergies that can lift whole industries in the country. This is because M&As give businesses an immediate way to enhance their portfolio of products, attain entry into newer markets, and enhance economies of scale

items.title: Tata Motors and Tata Power Renewable Energy and sign a MoU to set up 200 fast charging stations
items.description: "Electric CV users across the country,will soon benefit from access to almost 1000 strategically located fast chargers, with the planned expansion of the charging network," the company said in a statement

items.title: Microsoft to cut 650 support jobs in Xbox Games unit
items.description: Activision makes popular mobile titles including â€śCandy Crush Sagaâ€ť and â€śCall of Duty Mobileâ€ť â€“ games that were excluded from the cloud streaming deal Microsoft signed with Franceâ€™s Ubisoft Entertainment to secure approval from Britain

items.title: Top Indian Celebrities Whoâ€™ve Launched Successful Startups and Ventures
items.description: Explore how your favorite Indian celebrities are making a mark beyond the spotlight! From Alia Bhattâ€™s kids' wear line to MS Dhoniâ€™s sports ventures, dive into the exciting startups and entrepreneurial journeys of stars like Katrina Kaif, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Hrithik Roshan, Samantha Prabhu, Shraddha Kapoor, Deepak Chahar, and Sonu Sood. Discover how these icons are shaping industries and growing their brands!

items.title: Tamil Nadu: Samsung workers to continue strike after talks end without deal
items.description: Samsung India actively engaged with workers 'to address any grievances they may have and comply with all laws and regulations', a company spokesperson said on Monday.
